name: Continuum Craze
description:
You're in control of a spacecraft rover which travelled to all nine planets before. Somehow, the space time continuum has started going insane, different creatures are being created. Survive the waves of enemies and upgrade your rover to the max!

This game is made within 2 weeks.

Controls:

AD = Rotate

WS  = Move

Space = Shoot

M: Open Station(Shop)

POST-JAM UPDATES AND FIXES:

- Fixed the margins and such with the overlays and interface.

Team Members:

mahyellaw(programming/ design/sounds & music)

Haru Doma(lead design)

earonjhan(design)

Credits for some assets used:

Music source:  ecrett.com(it's why there's like a person speaking in the backg.)

Font is called Edit Undo Line by AEnigma, source: dafont.com

Some gibberish:

The game ended up into something quite great even if it didn't meet our initial expectation. Yet, most visuals are there and there is some basic gameplay, although it could use a bit more polish and game juice.

If anyone has some feedback, feel free to comment, we'd appreciate it! :D
